title: INEOS - Liquid Hand Soap - Moisturising Handwash - Antibacterial - White Rose + Neroli - 250ml - 6 bottles, Packaging May Vary
features: FOR EVERYONE: INEOS Antibacterial Soap nourishes and protects your hands while benefiting from the latest advances in fragrance. Our soaps are made to suit all skin types and are also dermatoligically tested.
PERFUMES: The soap combines fragrant notes known to enhance performance: rose helps strengthen the immune system, neroli has anti-stress properties and vanilla helps relieve anxiety
HYDRATING: This revolutionary soap, formulated with four unique moisturising agents, is suitable for sensitive skin as well as daily use, and helps restore your skin barrier
ESSENTIAL OILS: To scent our hand soaps, we use a technology based on purifying essential oils and phytoncides.

PHYTONCIDES: Phytoncides are biologically active molecules, released by plants and trees, known for their bactericidal, antioxidant and relaxing properties, and their ability to reduce stress and fatigue
description: Product Description ‘INEOS’ new hand wash range is no ordinary soap! Proven to actively improve the condition of your skin, this ground-breaking wash contains four unique moisturisers, ideal for sensitive hands and everyday use. Combining their antibacterial formula infused with phytoncide technology; dual-action molecules emitted by plants and trees which inhibit the development of bacteria whilst releasing aromas to combat feelings of stress or fatigue Ingredients Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Parfum, Glycol Distearate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Glyceryl Laurate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Polyquaternium-7, Benzophenone-3, Pentylene Glycol. Directions Do not store in direct sunlight Safety Warning "As with all cleansers, if product gets into the eyes, rinse well with water. Avoid contact with natural stone surfaces and stainless steel.
